message.content: {"id": "10403", "title": "Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed", "description": "When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should add a confirmation step to ensure that the output directory can be deleted and then rebuilt. Currently, some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder at a bin directory which contains more than just .class files that can be rebuilt from the available .java files.", "OB": "A confirmation step should be added during project creation to verify that the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt if necessary.", "EB": "The current project creation process does not include a confirmation to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.", "SR": "Add a confirmation step during project creation to verify the usability of the bin directory."}
